messages.title: MAKE 2010 THE YEAR OF CHANGE
messages.content: One thing is certain there has to be a General Election in the first half of 2010. At that election I am committed to doing everything I can to make sure you get a Conservative MP who will deliver for you in Parliament. Over the last year, even more voters who voted Liberal Democrat in 2005 have been coming to us. The next Government faces an enormous job to arrest the decline in our economy, business and public services and prevent things getting any worse.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: The Fight for Our Green Spaces
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Over the last year, Cheltenham's green space ... is still under threat. The Labour Government and their unelected inspectorate have ignored the wishes of local people and continue to push for new housing, driven by political priorities handed down from London.
I said last year that I wanted Cheltenham to host a very special festival to boost the economy of the town and put it on the world map.
Our NHS is a fantastic institution ... Where the General Hospital lacks specialist care or facilities, I will be fighting to make sure it has them.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fighting to Save Our Small Shops
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Independent small shops are the lifeblood of Cheltenham's economy ... I will be fighting for a fair deal for small businesses.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The next Government faces an enormous job to arrest the decline in our economy, business, and public services and prevent things from getting any worse.

issues.economy: The next Government faces an enormous job to arrest the decline in our economy, business and public services and prevent things getting any worse.
issues.education: Supporting our schools: I will have attended about 30 Governors meetings in the last year alone.
issues.environment: The Fight for Our Green Spaces: Over the last year, Cheltenham's green space ... is still under threat. Labour's failed eco-friendly timeline: Lots of people signed the petition.
issues.health: My NHS, Our NHS - I will be fighting for a fair deal for small businesses, fighting while Labour left our NHS facing the worst deficits since it was created.
issues.labourEmployment: Fighting to Save Our Small Shops: Independent small shops are the lifeblood of Cheltenham’s economy. I will be fighting for a fair deal for small businesses.
issues.lawCrime: Mark - a champion for Cheltenham tourism: Working to boost our tourism by busting crime and anti-social behaviour.

community.content: The Fight for Our Green Spaces: Over the last year, Cheltenham's green space  ... is still under threat. Labour's failed eco-friendly timeline: Lots of people signed the petition.
Planting for the future: One of my favourite projects this year has been tree planting. I was delighted to work with local schools.
